rules.natural: Provided that a tournament requires a license for a player, then the player has a valid license for that tournament.
Under the condition that the commission failed the background check of a player, it follows that the commission does not revoke the license of the player.

Either a player wins a qualifier for a tournament, or if it is not the case that the commission is investigating the player or the commission failed the background check of the player, then the player is not eligible to play in the tournament.
If a player receives prize money from a tournament, then it is not the case that the player pays taxes on the prize money.
A player receives prize money from a tournament, or the player has a sponsorship from a sponsor, or the tournament does not require a license for the player.
If a player signs a contract with a team, then the player does not receive a salary from the team.
A player signs a contract with a team, or, whenever a player receives prize money from a tournament, the player pays taxes on the prize money.
Provided that a player has obligations to a sponsor, the player receives a salary from a team.
The contract of a player is terminated by a team, or, if a player signs a contract with a team, then the player has obligations to a sponsor.
Provided that a player violates the rules of a tournament, then the tournament does not require a license for the player.
A player violates the rules of a tournament, or a player uses cheats in a tournament.
Under the condition that a player gets disqualified from a tournament, then if the player uses cheats in the tournament, the tournament does not require a license for the player.
Provided that the federation files an official complaint against a player, the federation submits evidence regarding the player.

Under the condition that a player meets the age requirement for a tournament, then if it is not the case that if the player is registered for the tournament then the tournament does not require a license for the player, the player has a penalty in the tournament.
Provided that a player has a valid license for a tournament, the commission approves the license for the player.
Under the condition that the commission is investigating a player, the player's playing rights are suspended in the tournament.
If it is not the case that if the federation submits evidence regarding a player then the player gets disqualified from the tournament, then the federation grants an appeal to the player.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if a player has a valid license for a tournament then the commission does not approve the license for the player, then the commission revokes the license of the player.
Provided that it is not the case that the commission is investigating the player or the commission failed the background check of the player, the player is eligible to play in the tournament.
Under the condition that a tournament is not active, it requires a license for a player.
